concept.title: A Few Words on Fusing Personality and Professionalism

conbody.p: We do not expect you to become a service robot, but you must familiarize yourself with and follow this basic protocol. Make the following steps your own, using your own professional vocabulary, tailoring each experience to the guests' needs. It may be helpful to observe some of our tenured servers at their tables, and to borrow some good phrases or habits that work for them. Our top priority is taking care of our guests in a professional and hospitable way.
